derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the sense 'make luminous'; formerly also as inlighten): in early use from Old English inlīhtan 'to shine'; later from en-, in- (as an intensifier) + lighten or the noun light

entry.def: To enlighten someone means to give them more knowledge and greater understanding about something.

example.ex: A few dedicated doctors have fought for years to enlighten the profession...
example.tran: 一些有献身精神的医生多年来一直努力指导业内同仁。

example.ex: If you know what is wrong with her, please enlighten me.
example.tran: 如果你知道她出什么问题了，请告诉我。

sentences.sentence: "Can you enlighten me--I don't understand this proposal"

means.word_mean: 2. give spiritual insight to; in religion
3. make free from confusion or ambiguity; make clear;

sentences.sentence: "Clear up the question of who is at fault"

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 动词前缀,通常加在名词前构成动词,表示"进入……之中,包围,成为"; 2. 动词前缀,表示"使……进入状态或加强等意思"

stems_affixes.word_buile: en进入……之中,包围,成为+dem人民+ic表形容词→在人民之中→地方性的
en进入……之中,包围,成为+cage笼子→v.关入笼中
en进入……之中,包围,成为+chain锁链→v.束缚
en进入……之中,包围,成为+roll转,倦→往里倦→注册

stems_affixes.value_cn: 给……题名, 给……称号;授权, 授权
stems_affixes.word_buile: en进入……之中,包围,成为+title标题,头衔→v. 给……题名, 给……称号;授权, 授权
en进入……之中,包围,成为+trap陷阱→v.以网或陷阱捕捉
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+purple紫→v.使成紫色 v.发紫
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+act行动→进入行动→颁布[法令]
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+chant反复说;咒语→被咒语所迷醉
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+courage勇气→使人进入勇气→鼓励
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+danger危险→v.使危险
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+franchise特权,公民权→给予选举权

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使忙碌, 雇佣, 预定
stems_affixes.word_buile: en使……进入状态或加强等意思+gage挑战→进入挑战→忙碌于……
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+large大→v.扩大, 放大
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+light光+en变成→给人光明→启发
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+list名单→进入名单→入伍

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使富足, 使肥沃, 装饰, 加料于, 浓缩
stems_affixes.word_buile: en使……进入状态或加强等意思+rich富的→v.使富足, 使肥沃, 装饰, 加料于, 浓缩

stems_affixes.value_cn: 包裹, 围绕, 包围;使专注
stems_affixes.word_buile: en使……进入状态或加强等意思+wrap包裹→v.包裹, 围绕, 包围;使专注

Sentence.sentence: For decades,these descendants of the Viking shave been trying to show the world that the right mix of enlightened policy.

It seems very good for Harvard to honor such a high profile popularizer of the irrational…… at a time when political and religious nonsense so jeopardize the rule of reason in this allegedly enlightened democracy and around the world

means.word_mean: 启发；开导；阐明；启蒙；教导

sentences.en: Would you enlighten me on your plans for the future?
sentences.cn: 请给我解释一下你将来的计划好吗?

jushi.english: The object of his novel writing is to amuse and enlighten the general reader.
jushi.chinese: 他写小说的目的在于使一般读者得到娱乐并受到教育。

jushi.english: Listen to both sides and you will be enlightened.
Peter thought the world was flat until I enlightened him.
jushi.chinese: 在我开导彼特以前,他认为地球是扁平的。
